titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University of Michigan response to September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: University of Michigan response to September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.scopecontent: Material collected from various sources relating to the campus reponse and reaction to the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks. Includes copies of campus publications, programs, tributes, information on alumni killed in the attacks, and printouts of e-mail and websites, also some material from the one year anniversary.
